org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp.indicators

Class IndicatorTextualTokenBehaviour

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.behaviours.TextualTokenBehaviour
      • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.amp.indicators.IndicatorTextualTokenBehaviour
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behaviour<NiTextCell>

    public class IndicatorTextualTokenBehaviour
extends TextualTokenBehaviour
    This behaviour matches TextualTokenBehaviour with the exception of how horizontal reduce is done. For indicators we want to keep all values and display them in a specific order. See more at IndicatorCellComparator.
